data.label: 团结引擎
data.description: 团结引擎是 Unity 中国研发团队推出的 Unity 中国版引擎，它以 Unity 2022 LTS 为研发基础，推出了微信小游戏解决方案、团结引擎车机版，赋予小游戏和智能汽车领域的开发者，以更强劲的创作动能，是 Unity 中国加速本土化进程的里程碑。

data.label: Unity Engine
data.description: Unity Engine is the Chinese version of the Unity engine launched by the Unity China R&D team, based on Unity 2022 LTS. It introduces solutions for WeChat mini-games and the Unity Engine car version, providing developers in the mini-game and smart automotive fields with more robust creative momentum, marking a milestone in Unity China's acceleration of localization.
